description:
Time for a new chain? This reliable option from KMC will get your 12-speed steed back on the trails, roads or bike lanes in no time.

  • Compatible with SRAM, Shimano and Campagnolo 12-speed drivetrains
  • Nickel plating prevents corrosion and adds durability
  • Inner and outer chamfering for smoother shifting in 1x drivetrains
  • Non-directional
name: KMC X12 12 Speed Chain
